From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

ãPhone’s Safe Like in an Infant SeatãThis car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
ã0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operationã andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
ã360Â° Flexible Rotation as Wishã Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360Â° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
ãWide Compatible with All Smartphonesã This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
ãAndobil Car Phone Holder Serviceã Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Product Description

Client desktop delivers right-sized performance

USFF desktop with power-saving and space-saving.

The OptiPlex 7010, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving chassis.This Computer redefines small form factor desktop computers by going beyond small towers.

Specifications

Processor: Intel Core i5-3470S 2.9 GHz Turbo 3.6 GHz
Memory: 8GB DDR3
Storage: 240GB SSD
Optical driver: DVD
Port: USB 3.0, VGA, DisplayPort, RJ-45

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the OptiPlex 7010 like Dual DP ports, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection. Support multi display.

Powerful processor

Select from Intel Core i5-3470S 2.9 GHz Turbo 3.6 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 7010 for most userâs needs.

Robust storage and memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, 8G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

240 GB Solid state drive

The OptiPlex 7010 comes with 240G SSD support faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 7010 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 91-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.
Includes: USB Keyboard & Mouse, USB WIFI Adapter, Microsoft office 30 days free trail.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

item.dc:creator: admin

item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.99 - $4.89
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:04 UTC – Details)


The Chuckit! ultra dog toy ball is the ultimate fetch Ball, designed to bounce higher, float better, last longer, and stand out from the rest. Made from natural, high-bounce rubber, The ultra ball encourages dogs to leap and jump for more stimulating games of fetch. Featuring an extra-thick rubber core, These dog fetch toys are durable for long-term use, yet lightweight and buoyant as water toys for dogs. Chuckit! Ultra balls are strong dog toys that hold up to dirt and slobber and are easy to wipe clean. The bright orange and blue design grabs dogs’ Attention in the air and can be easily spotted in tall grass or on water. Available in five sizes ranging from Small to XX-Large, dogs of all sizes can enjoy fetch with the Chuckit! ultra ball. Two-packs are available in select sizes for pet parents to keep an extra ultra ball on hand. The Chuckit! ultra ball is compatible with the Chuckit! ball Launcher for dogs, enhancing fetch with slobber-less pickup and long-distance throws.

TOUGH & DURABLE: Rubber ball for dogs has a textured surface & a thick rubber core for aggressive chewers yet is soft on dog’s mouths
PET TOYS: Get ready for bonding & fun with your dogs & cats! Check out a variety of our pet toy products such as frisbees, perches & mirrors for birds, prey wand toys for cats, plush toys, light-up interactive toys & more
CHUCKIT! FETCH TOYS: Chuckit! creates toys that enrich the human-animal bond & bright colors help dogs & puppies stay engaged. Checkout Chuckit! for ball launchers, bouncy balls, frisbees, indoor dog toys, glow toys & more!
JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit! , Jackson Galaxy & more!

Made from natural, high-bounce rubber, the Ultra Ball encourages dogs to leap and jump for more stimulating games of fetch. Featuring an extra-thick rubber exterior, these dog fetch toys are durable for long-term use, yet lightweight and buoyant as water toys for dogs.

Chuckit! Ultra Balls are strong dog toys that hold up to dirt and slobber and are easy to wipe clean.

From the brand

About MANCYFIT

MANCYFIT strives to providing superior service to make you 100% satisfied, high-quality and comfortable clothing for your daily life.

What makes our products unique?

MANCYFIT is an international brand and clothing design company founded in 2016. The company was built in a passion for high-quality everyday wear with the goal of making life comfortable.

Inspired by lifeâs need, we strive to offer clothing in simple, everyday styles with a sense of versatile wearing in all seasons. We emphasizing every details carefully, and always striving to do better.

Thermal Set for Men

Thermal Top For Winter Warm

Soft Comfortable Thermal Pant

Thermal Set for Women

Package Dimensions â : â 12.48 x 8.54 x 1.81 inches; 11.01 Ounces
Date First Available â : â September 18, 2020
ASIN â : â B08JCD7DY8

ãULTRA SOFT & WARM FABRICã Made of Polyester 95% + spandex 5% blend super skin-touch fabric, these base layer thermals for men are soft and comfy. The latest 4-way stretch material provides a breathable and comfortable fit.
ãKEEP WARM IN NICE THICKNESSã Perfect for cold weather, comfy stretch long johns in normal thickness is fleece lined, lightweight but warm, works excellently during your winter activities like snowboarding for added warmth and thermal insulation.
ãTOP & BOTTOM INCLUDEDã Our mens long johns thermal set consists of a long sleeve top and a pair of full length pants with fly front opening, which are great to be wear as a set and also performs well as a single fleece top or a pair of basic leggings or tights.
ãTHERMALS FOR COLD WINTERã Classic thermal long underwear must be your essential piece in this winter, a perfect basic layer under clothes to meet different fashion. Also can be an ultra-soft pajama set for cold winter nights.
ãFAST SHIPPING & FLEXIBLE RETURN POLICYã 100% Product guarantee, add these Thermal Underwear for Men to your cart by clicking the “Add-to-cart” Button while you will own a 30-day, full-money-back warranty and can be returned or exchanged if you are unsatisfied on this item.

Definitely Household Scissors — Great for cutting burlap, paper, card stock, cardboard, wrapping paper, light line, fabric, tape, photos, coupons, and opening boxes & packaging. Surprised for sewing, tailoring, quilting, dressmaking, cutting patterns, cutting quilting, Vinyl, Leather, and making face masks. Exceptional scissors for multiple uses in various rooms, in the Handcraft Workshop, bathroom, sewing room, laundry room, craft room, at the office, great for most regular household tasks.
3 Pairs of Quality Straight Handled Scissors — They strongly allow you to make precise cuts with great control as the blade has the perfect amount of friction, which is very comfortable to use. 3 pairs of straight handled scissors for smooth, efficient cutting scissors for general use. Suitable for teachers’ middle/high school classroom supplies.
Sharp and Durable — Durable stainless steel blades enable high-density steel that makes it 3 times harder than normal stainless steel and is smoother cutting. 6 X longer lasting than the previous formula and remain sharp for 100,000 + cuts. Blades stay sharper longer; We chose bright colors, green/purple/orange. Different color rubber handles are used in different places, Soft-grip holes let you maintain a comfortable, can be used left- or right-handed.
iBayam 8-Inch Soft-Grip Scissors — 3 special scissors are suitable for most items that need to be cut. It can also be used as household scissors for cutting open frozen food bags ready for cooking. Convenient, sturdy, especially sharp scissors for general use, and very durable.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $298.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:12:18 UTC – Details)


Tulasi 2023 14 inches Full HD Windows 11 Laptop Computer

Intel Celeron Quad-Core N4120
Enjoy this Windows laptop with a 10th generation Intel Gemini Lake Celeron N4120 Processor 4 Cores 4 Threads 4MB cache,
built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz. Experience entertainment features and fast connectivity

12GB RAM Laptop Sufficient Storage
12GB memory for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your applications. 256GB M.2 2280 SATA3 SSD fast boot-up time and data access,
no noise, enough space for you to store pictures, music, and videos. Save files faster and store more data

Pre-install Windows 11 Pro
Tulasi T Pro Laptop with Windows 11 Pro system, experience the security and increased responsiveness of Windows laptops,
it’s very suitable for business work, school study, and home entertainment.

Tulasi T Pro Laptop Technical Specifications:

CPU: Intel 4-Cores N4120 processor, 4M Cache, up to 2.60 GHz

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz

Memory: 12GB LPDDR4

Storage: M.2 SATA3 256GB SSD (expandable up to 1 TB)

Display: 14 inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 300 nits

Operating System: Pre-install Windows 11 Pro

Connectivity: 2.4G/5G WiFi support 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.2

Ports: 2 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x Mini HD, 1 x Micro SD slot, 1 x Headphone Jack, 1 x DC

Keyboard: Chocolate keyboard with lift design

Webcam: 0.3M camera and dual array digital microphones

Battery: 34.2Wh Polymer lithium-ion battery, up to 6 hours

Color: Space gray

Dimensions: 12.8*8.3*0.37 – 0.65inch / 325*212*9.5 – 16.5mm

Weight: 2.88lb / 1.3kg

What’s in the box: Tulasi T Pro Laptop x 1, Power Adapter x 1
[ ULTRA THIN AND PORTABLE ] – This computer laptop is only 0.37 to 0.65 inch thin and lightweighs only 2.88 lb, it’s easy to take this laptop pc anywhere, It also gets an 34.2Wh high-capacity battery that can last up to 6 hours long battery life.
[ RELIABLE PERFORMANCE ] – Tackle your daily tasks easily and quickly with the performance of a Intel Gemini Lake Quad-Core Processor, 4M cache, Base Frequency 1.1 GHz Burst Frequency 2.60 GHz, built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, Support 4K@60Hz.
[ 12GB RAM + 256GB SSD ] – 12GB LPDDR4 RAM for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your programs, and browser tabs. with 256GB M.2 SATA3 SSD storage, experience 3x faster data transfer performance than a traditional eMMC hard drive, faster boot time.
[ 14 INCHES LAPTOP WINDOWS 11 ] – It comes with Windows 11 Pro system, new look and feel, maximize your productivity, with a 14 inches micro-edge Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS screen, you can enjoy clear, bright and vivid picture.
[ CONVENIENCE AND WARRANTY ] – Experience smooth wireless connection with 802.11.ac 2.4G/5G WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2. Rich-ports include 2 USB 3.0, Mini HD, DC Charging, Audio jack, Micro SD slot. All Tulasi laptops come with a 1-year warranty, you can enjoy it.
